item.title: META
item.description: score:-44 Chances: The company’s FoA segment, which includes Facebook, Instagram, Messenger, and WhatsApp, continues to drive significant user engagement and revenue generation. The potential in the RL segment, with its focus on augmented, virtual, and mixed reality, could provide long-term growth opportunities for the company.

item.title: SNAP
item.description: score:-85 Chances: Snap (SNAP) closed the most recent trading day at $11.19, showing a slight decrease from the previous trading session, but the overall trend seems stable. Social media companies like Pinterest and Snap are focused on increasing their domestic user base, indicating potential growth opportunities for Snap.
